root.description: OverviewYou are a budding entrepreneur, whose hotel is rather unfortunately located within the territory of a very bad Texas Tyrant named Tarnation Tadstock. Your only defense against Tadstockâ€™s army of seagulls, rats, yetis, and more is to build your hotel as quickly and intelligently as possible, using an array of increasingly sophisticated weapons.The game features five different themed locations that you have to try and make it through by simply protecting the main hotel from a variety of creatures. Created by iOS app developer Lucky Frame.Types of RoomsThere are six different type of rooms to use with different abilities to try and complete the level, these are:Basic Rooms For RentGun RoomsMine LaunchersHospitalsIce RoomsShort Term SolutionsLocationsOn initial release there are five locations for players to try and get through:Desert DownfallShoreline ShamblesMountain MayhemVillainsvilleGalactic Gambit
